## NetworkService.hostname() method

Returns the hostname of the NetworkService, once it is known.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hostname(scope: NetworkScope): string | undefined;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | <code>NetworkScope</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string | undefined`
